content:
@Dieuwertje Bloemen @Dimitri Szabo @Philipp Conzett Now that the final report* has been published, at https://www.gdcc.io/working-groups.html should the Sustainability working group be moved to inactive? Or are you still going strong? Maybe taking in feedback on the report? :thinking:

  • #community > Final Report of Dataverse Sustainability WG Published

I was thinking the same last Friday. It's inactive now. The idea is to see if there should be a new group around this at some point to continue with the next phase, but that's up to the GDCC steering group. So, I'll move it to inactive (for now, perhaps) with a PR. I will add the run-time, because I think that might be helpful in general. Do we have runtimes of the other inactive groups?
I don't think so but I do agree that the runtime is interesting.
